Which of the following sentences is the impolite version of "I tried to call you; were you busy?"?  
A) You never answer your phone.  
B) Did you receive my calls?  
C) Why didn't you pick up the phone?  
D) Have you been busy lately?
What is the main idea the TEXT is trying to convey about the pairs of sentences it provides?
